titleStmt.title: I Know I Can But I Don t Want To

publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.head: I Know I Can But I Don't Want To

lg.l: I can't hold on, whats gone is gone
and whts here is near to nothing
I know I can, but I don't want to
I just miss the lips I used to kiss
if what you want is what you gettin
wel no one knows whats good for you
I'm looking out for some one new
but I gues I'm not as quick as you
I want to hold you tight
I want to hold you tight
I'd love to spend the night and hold
it's the best smell in the world
you pulled me out of somthing bad
and you took me some where good
